channel.title: CVE Feed for Eclipse Foundation -- Mosquitto
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eclipse Foundation -- Mosquitto

item.title: CVE-2024-8376|2024-10-11T15:36:51.348Z -- eclipse%20foundation -- mosquitto
item.description: In Eclipse Mosquitto up to version 2.0.18a, an attacker can achieve memory leaking, segmentation fault or heap-use-after-free by sending specific sequences of "CONNECT", "DISCONNECT", "SUBSCRIBE", "UNSUBSCRIBE" and "PUBLISH" packets.
